typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Year as string,
		City as string,
		Province as string,
		DGUID as string,
		Homicides as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HomicidesCanadaCSV
source(output(
		Province as string,
		Code as string,
		{Standard geographical classification (SGC) code} as string,
		{Region name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
